title: Sweet chilli prawn and egg noodle salad
description: This easy healthy sweet chilli prawn and egg noodle salad is perfect for summertime
ingredients: 4 celery sticks, finely sliced on the diagonal
4 tbsp sweet chilli sauce, plus extra to serve

method.Step 1: Put the noodles in a large bowl. Pour over a kettle of boiling water and cover with cling film. Set aside for 5 minutes, stirring halfway, until just softened. Drain, run under cold water to cool, then drain again and tip into a large bowl.

method.Step 2: Add the celery, radishes, beansprouts and prawns. Drizzle with the chilli sauce, season and toss everything together until combined.

method.Step 3: Divide between plates and serve with extra chilli sauce to drizzle over.
